# ==============================================================================
# Bug #15: No URL Length Limit (DoS)
# ==============================================================================
#
# Severity: ðŸŸ¢ P2 (Denial of Service)
#
# Description:
#   The original code had no maximum URL length check. Extremely long
#   URLs can cause performance issues in:
#     - percentDecode() (string allocation/copying)
#     - normalizeUrl() (tolower over entire string)
#     - getaddrinfo() (DNS resolution with huge input)
#
# Fix applied:
#   Added MAX_URL_LENGTH (2048) check at the start of validateUrl().
#   URLs exceeding this length are immediately rejected.
#
# Test strategy:
#   URLs are padded to exceed 2048 characters.
#
# Expected result: ALL entries should be BLOCKED (too long).
# ==============================================================================

# --- 2049-char URL (just over the 2048 limit) targeting loopback ---
http://127.0.0.

# --- Long URL targeting metadata endpoint ---
https://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-
